function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of handwashing facilities with soap and alcohol-based hand rub","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading respiratory infections, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Provide handwashing stations with soap and alcohol-based hand rub dispensers","Technologies":"Hand sanitizer dispensers, soap dispensers","People":"Employees, visitors, and public at offshore facilities","Owner":"Facility management and employers"},{"Description":"Poor ventilation in offshore facilities","Impact":"Increased spread of respiratory diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Ensure good ventilation by maintaining fresh air delivery and regulating humidity levels","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air filters, HE-PA filtration units","People":"Employees, visitors, and public at offshore facilities","Owner":"Facility management and employers"},{"Description":"Lack of administrative controls to minimize exposure to SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to COVID-19 in the offshore workplace","Mitigation":"Implement administrative controls including online meetings, shift arrangements, and training on COVID-19 protocols","Technologies":"Online communication tools, training materials, company policies","People":"Employees at offshore facilities","Owner":"Employers and management"}]}
